org.coniks.coniks_server

Class SignatureOps

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.coniks.coniks_server.SignatureOps

  • public class SignatureOps
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements all operations involving digital signatures that a CONIKS server must perform. Current encryption/signing algorithm used: RSA with SHA-256.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SignatureOps() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static byte[] sign(byte[] input)
      Deprecated. 
      Replaced with Signing.rsaSign(RSAPrivateKey, byte[]).
      static boolean verifySig(byte[] msg, byte[] signature, java.lang.String keyOwner)
      Deprecated. 
      Replaced with Signing.rsaVerify(RSAPublicKey, byte[], byte[]).
      static boolean verifySigFromDSA(byte[] msg, byte[] sig, java.security.PublicKey pk)
      Deprecated. 
      Replaced with Signing.dsaVerify(DSAPublicKey, byte[], byte[]).

    • Method Detail

      • sign

        @Deprecated
public static byte[] sign(byte[] input)
        Deprecated. Replaced with Signing.rsaSign(RSAPrivateKey, byte[]).
        Digitally sign the input.
        Returns:
        The byte[] containing the digital signature of the input.
        Throws:
        A - RuntimeException if there is a problem with the private key loaded from the server's keystore.

      • verifySig

        @Deprecated
public static boolean verifySig(byte[] msg,
                           byte[] signature,
                           java.lang.String keyOwner)
        Deprecated. Replaced with Signing.rsaVerify(RSAPublicKey, byte[], byte[]).
        Verify a given server keyOwner's digital signature signature on the message msg.
        Returns:
        true if the signature on the message is valid, false otherwise.

      • verifySigFromDSA

        @Deprecated
public static boolean verifySigFromDSA(byte[] msg,
                                  byte[] sig,
                                  java.security.PublicKey pk)
        Deprecated. Replaced with Signing.dsaVerify(DSAPublicKey, byte[], byte[]).
        Verify msg with sig using pk
